org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base

Interface ISparseEqnObject<TAij,TBi>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISparseEquation
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISparseEqnComplex, ISparseEqnComplexMatrix3x3, ISparseEqnMatrix2x2
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SparseEqnComplexImpl, SparseEqnComplexMatrix3x3Impl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl

    public interface ISparseEqnObject<TAij,TBi>
extends ISparseEquation
    Sparse Equation of data type T for solving the [A]X=B problem. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base.ISparseEquation

        ISparseEquation.IndexType

    • Method Detail

      • addToA

        void addToA(TAij x,
            int i,
            int j)
        Add the aij object to the matrix. If aij exists, aij += x.
        Parameters:
        x - the aij element
        i - the element row number
        j - the element column number
